tool_input.result:
### Task Completed

The workflow has been implemented to trigger manually, read news headlines from the specified Google Sheet, classify each headline as 'technology' or 'sport' using AI, and send individual Slack messages to the #general channel with the classification results.

All actions and trigger are defined and configured properly. The main workflow connects them correctly, and tests show successful execution and message delivery.

You can now trigger the workflow manually to classify news headlines and send results to Slack as requested.
